channel.title: Help please
channel.description: [size=10pt][b]Hello, i need help deleting objects and moving objects on my 317 delta server, so if any of you would take the time to tell me i would really be grateful, and just so you know I'm new to coding so don't mock me :p thanks[/b][/size]

item.title: Help please
item.dc:creator: @Boss_Of_Weed Boss Of Weed
item.description:
@Boss_Of_Weed wrote:

[quote=“Mr. Bobby, post:6, topic:361693”]its so simple, first find the exact x and y coords of the object, you can do this by typing ::mypos and you will get the x and y, of exactly where your standing.(it’ll be 2 sets of numbers, the first being the x coordinate and the 2nd being the y coord) so if you was to type

deletethatobject(1000, 2510, 1);

deletethatobject is pretty simple to understand.
1000 is the x coordinate

2510 is the y coordinate
and 1 is the height, tbh I cant remember if 1 or 0 is ground lvl. But its not that hard.[/quote]

oh i get it, thanks man

Epic Steve:

Learn maths.

and steave, go fack your self you

Read full topic

item.title: Help please
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Bobby Mr. Bobby
item.description:
@Mr_Bobby wrote:

its so simple, first find the exact x and y coords of the object, you can do this by typing ::mypos and you will get the x and y, of exactly where your standing.(it’ll be 2 sets of numbers, the first being the x coordinate and the 2nd being the y coord) so if you was to type

deletethatobject(1000, 2510, 1);

deletethatobject is pretty simple to understand.
1000 is the x coordinate
2510 is the y coordinate
and 1 is the height, tbh I cant remember if 1 or 0 is ground lvl. But its not that hard.

Read full topic

item.title: Help please
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Steve Epic Steve
item.description:
@Epic_Steve wrote:

deletethatobject(X, Y, Height)

X = X coord.
Y = Y coord.
Height = Height level.

Read full topic
